_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The eight benefits of cultivating heart': You can’t be harmed by fire, poison, or blade.
If you don’t reach any higher, you’ll be reborn in a Brahmā realm.
The merit created by loving all creature: Loving just one creature with a hateless heart makes you a good person.
Compassionate for all creatures, a noble one creates abundant merit.
The things to avoid with love for all se: Don’t kill or cause others to kill
Don’t conquer or encourage others to conquer
With love for all sentient beings, you’ll have no enmity for anyone.
